name: 像素修真 - Pixel Xiuzhen
description: Pixel Xiuzhen is a unique Roguelike single-player game.With Oriental mythology as the background, experienced numerous times of Du jie and reincarnation, and finally rose to the immortal.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+ DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
